# computationAccuracy

**Instance Property**

The level of accuracy to compute the optical flow.

## Declaration

```swift
final var computationAccuracy: TrackOpticalFlowRequest.ComputationAccuracy { get set }
```

## Discussion

The computational time trends with accuracy level. The default value is [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/TrackOpticalFlowRequest/ComputationAccuracy-swift.enum/high].

## Configuring a request

- **TrackOpticalFlowRequest.ComputationAccuracy**: A type that describes the computational accuracy.
- **outputPixelFormatType**: The desired pixel format type of the observation.
- **supportedOutputPixelFormatTypes**: The collection of supported pixel format types.
